title: Tolous
description: A Roman mansio believed to have been located on an elevated site about 3.5km south of the modern Spanish town of Monzón where the Ermita de Nuestra Señora de la Alegría (Chapel of Our Lady of Joy) now stands.

properties.description: Point selected in Google Earth in July 2012 at an eye altitude of 538m. Dates follow BAtlas.
properties.title: Entrance of the Ermita de Nuestra Señora de la Alegría at Monzón, Spain
